metadata.title: Solution-phase synthesis of 2-cyano and 2-amido aziridinyl peptides

abstract.original_text: Starting from a library of 2-L-a-amino acyl (E)-acrylonitriles, different short 2-cyano and 2-amido aziridinyl peptides, potential protease inhibitors, were obtained under parallel solution-phase conditions. The transformations include careful selection of conditions for aziridine deprotection and cyano group partial hydrolysis.

sentences.segment_text: Starting from a library of 2-L-a-amino acyl ( E ) - acrylonitriles ,
potential protease inhibitors , were obtained under parallel solution-phase conditions .
The transformations include careful selection of conditions for aziridine deprotection and cyano group partial hydrolysis .
